pr_title: chore(api) remove responseType from GraphQLOperation, since we already know it from the GraphQLRequest

timeline.message: chore(api) remove responseType from GraphQLOperation, since we already know it from the GraphQLRequest

timeline.body: This is the main change.  We don't need to pass `request` _and_ `typeOfT` because we can get `typeOfT` via `request.getResponseType()`.
timeline.bodyText: This is the main change.  We don't need to pass request and typeOfT because we can get typeOfT via request.getResponseType().
timeline.bodyHTML: This is the main change. We don't need to pass request and typeOfT because we can get typeOfT via request.getResponseType().
timeline.author: richardmcclellan
